Discover Your Next Favorite Vacation at Westgate Resorts
Searching for great vacation specials at some of the world's most popular destinations? Discover unbeatable hotel deals and world-class amenities at Westgate Resorts! Whether you crave
seaside Hawaii hotels
, escapes at a
Gatlinburg mountain resort
, big-city
dream vacations in NYC
, or exciting getaways at
hotels with water parks
minutes from major theme parks, we've got
somewhere
for everyone.
Exclusive Hotel Deals & Vacation Packages
Open modal box
Photo light box
VI Resorts by Westgate
VI Resorts by Westgate is a major expansion to some of the most popular destinations in the world. These locations include ideal vacation spots around the United States, including picturesque Hawaii, the sandy beaches of Mexico, and resort locations throughout Canada.
Explore VI Resorts by Westgate
VI Resorts by Westgate
VI Resorts by Westgate is a major expansion to some of the most popular destinations in the world. These locations include ideal vacation spots around the United States, including picturesque Hawaii, the sandy beaches of Mexico, and resort locations throughout Canada.
Explore VI Resorts by Westgate
Open modal box
Photo light box
Labor Day Getaway Deals
During our Labor Day Sale, you can save up to 30% off at your favorite destination. Whether you’re looking to soak up the sun in Hawaii, hike the nature parks in Smoky Mountains or chase the theme park thrills in Orlando, there’s still time to make one more summer memory!
Save More Today

Labor Day Getaway Deals
During our Labor Day Sale, you can save up to 30% off at your favorite destination. Whether you’re looking to soak up the sun in Hawaii, hike the nature parks in Smoky Mountains or chase the theme park thrills in Orlando, there’s still time to make one more summer memory!

Experience More with WOW Loyalty!
The World of Westgate Loyalty Program is COMPLETELY FREE and elevates your vacations to the next level with the best online rates, exclusive discounts on everything from on-property dining to water park access, enhanced services and check-in experiences, and more!
